title: Russian Financial Network Penetration Strategy (2010-2020)
description: Track systematic Russian exploitation of American-created offshore banking and shell company networks for electoral influence
source_document: The Capture Cascade - Part 3: The Weaponization.pdf
research_notes: Generated from systematic analysis of Putin's weaponization of American institutional capture techniques. Focus on specific dates, personnel connections, and methodological innovations that improved upon American models.
research_areas: Russian money flows through networks created by American shock therapy for global capital
Offshore banking, shell companies, and complex ownership structures exploitation
Political network penetration using American institutional influence operation methods
Conservative media platform, think tank research, and academic institution utilization for foreign influence
